label: ham
subject: Re: new FAQs
body: 88 (return) [ On this occasion, we must prefer the unsuspected testimony of Zosimus and Zonaras to the flattering assertions of Julian. The younger Victor paints the character of Magnentius in a singular light: ÒSermonis acer, animi tumidi, et immodice timidus; artifex tamen ad occultandam audaci¾ specie formidinem.Ó Is it most likely that in the battle of Mursa his behavior was governed by nature or by art should incline for the latter.]
